title: San Francisco/SoMa
name: DNA Lounge
price: There is usually a cover between $3 and $25 (for the bands)
content: The DNA Lounge is a 2-story club which often caters to the geekier "digerati" crowd. One of the founders is Jamie Zawinski, a former Netscape superstar and Internet nabob. Events feature themed electronica dance nights (Industrial, Techno, Trance, etc.) and live bands.
